text:
Pierre Lhomme (5 April 1930 – 4 July 2019) was a French cinematographer. He was known for his works were "Cyrano de Bergerac", "Lovers Like Us" and "Deadly Circuit". Lhomme was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France. He retired in 2003.
Lhomme died on 4 July 2019 in Arles, France at the age of 89.
